definition: to feel wronged/to cause sb to feel wronged/grievance
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: Both sides feeled a sense of grievance.
sentences.chinese: 雙方都覺得自己很委屈。

sentences.english: Loves you truly the girl, is being wronged time always first thinks of you.
sentences.chinese: 真正愛你的女孩，在受委屈的時候總是第一個想到你。

sentences.english: You may feel angry at times in your caregiving .
sentences.chinese: 在幫助他人的過程中，有時你會感到委屈。

sentences.english: She acted out the role of a wronged lover to make him feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她裝出一副受委屈的情人的樣子，以讓他感到內疚。

sentences.english: This situation if you marry purple the number is wrong each other.
sentences.chinese: 這種情況之下如果再娶紫焉就委屈對方了。

sentences.english: He is so broad-minded that he never owns anger even when suffering wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他心胸非常豁達，即使他受了委屈，也從來不生氣。

sentences.english: She used to have servants: now she finds it a come-down to have to do the work herself.
sentences.chinese: 她過去僱有傭人，現在她得自己幹活，覺得很委屈。

sentences.english: In order not to violate the mother lives, Liu Naou deliberately wronged themselves, something the mother can be described as Shiko.
sentences.chinese: 爲了不違母命，劉吶鷗刻意委屈自己，事母可謂至孝。

sentences.english: It’s entirely possible to enjoy your life without spending so much of it bent over in submission.
sentences.chinese: 享受人生而不太委屈自己是完全有可能的。

sentences.english: I blubbered for a while venting my sadness.
sentences.chinese: 我大哭大鬧一場，狠狠地發泄我的委屈。

sentences.english: I collect the sad humiliation there.
sentences.chinese: 我把最心酸的委屈匯在那裏。

sentences.english: The paratroopers are changing into their gear in the barrack, but Perconte is feeling very chagrin.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們在營房裏換制服，但是普康迪覺得很委屈。

sentences.english: They share their grievances with each other and confront many subjects they’d long avoided.
sentences.chinese: 她們傾訴了各自的委屈以及長期以來一直迴避的東西。

sentences.english: Stirringly talking was really good, didn't need to discommode oneself again.
sentences.chinese: 痛快淋漓的講話真好，不需要再委屈自己了。

sentences.english: Squat down to touch his own shadow, sorry to let you wronged.
sentences.chinese: 蹲下來撫摸自己的影子，對不起讓你受委屈了。

sentences.english: When falling into conflict with others, we are always right while the counterpart is totally wrong.
sentences.chinese: 與人發生衝突時，錯的總是對方，受委屈的纔是自己。

definition: sinuous/devious/full details of a story/to stoop
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
to love dearly/to feel sorry for sb/to regret/to grudge/to be distressed
to feel guilty/to feel ashamed of oneself/to be remorseful
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
guilty conscience/to feel a twinge of guilt
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
